section.name: Downloads
section.p: Cayenne can be downloaded either as binary or as source distribution.
section.panel: Source distribution is "binary + source", and consists of a full binary package and an extra "src" subdirectory.
section.p:
Depending on what kind of user you are, there are the folowing types of download packages (can be both source and binary).
Release Builds
Milestone Builds
Nightly Builds
These releases can be obtained from our download site.
